spec.name: Book_a_flight_7958SB
spec.description: Use this flow to book a flight

stop.description: Number of stops written as text (e.g., 'Nonstop', '1 stop', '2 stops')

time.description: Departure and arrival time (e.g., '10:30 AM - 01:40 PM')

price.description: Flight price in USD or chosen currency

airline.description: Name or airline + flight number (e.g., 'Delta DL404')

stop.description: Number of stops written as text (e.g., 'Nonstop', '1 stop', '2 stops')

time.description: Departure and arrival time (e.g., '10:30 AM - 01:40 PM')

price.description: Flight price in USD or chosen currency

airline.description: Name or airline + flight number (e.g., 'Delta DL404')

conditions.variableName: flow["Book a flight"]["Do you want to book these flights?"].output.value

conditions.expression: flow["Book a flight"]["Do you want to book these flights?"].output.value is False

spec.name: CodeBlock 1

cities.description: List of cities for top 50 airports

city.description: The primary city served by the airport.

airports.description: list of cities and corresponding airport coides

spec.fn:
def get_airport_code(city_name):
    # Normalize city name (case-insensitive search)
    city_name = city_name.strip().lower()

    # Search for city in the list
    for entry in flow["Book a flight"]["Get list of cities"].output.airports:
        if entry["city"].lower() == city_name:
            return entry["airport_code"]
    
    # If not found
    return None

self.output.departureCity = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Departure City"]
self.output.departureAirport = get_airport_code(self.output.departureCity)
self.output.arrivalCity = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Arrival City"]
self.output.arrivalAirport = get_airport_code(self.output.arrivalCity)
self.output.tripType = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Trip Type"]
self.output.startDate = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Start Date"]
self.output.returnDate = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Return Date"]
self.output.ticketClass = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output["Ticket Class"]
self.output.travelers = flow["Book a flight"]["Search available flights"].output.Travelers

spec.name: CodeBlock 2

spec.fn:
#outboundFlight = flow["Book a flight"]["Outbound Flights"].output["Choose your flight"][0]
outboundFlight = flow["Book a flight"]["Outbound Flights"].output["Choose your flight"]
self.output.outboundAirline = outboundFlight.airline
self.output.outboundPrice = outboundFlight.price
outboundDuration = outboundFlight.duration
outboundTime = outboundFlight.time
#self.output.outboundTimings = outboundDuration + " | " + outboundTime
self.output.outboundTimings = outboundTime
self.output.outboundStops = outboundFlight.stop
self.output.outboundBoarding = outboundFlight.boarding
self.output.outboundGate = outboundFlight.gate

#returnFlight = flow["Book a flight"]["Return Flights"].output["Choose your flight"][0]
returnFlight = flow["Book a flight"]["Return Flights"].output["Choose your flight"]
self.output.returnAirline = returnFlight.airline
self.output.returnPrice = returnFlight.price
returnDuration = returnFlight.duration
returnTime = returnFlight.time
#self.output.returnTimings = returnDuration + " | " + returnTime
self.output.returnTimings = returnTime
self.output.returnStops = returnFlight.stop
self.output.returnBoarding = returnFlight.boarding
self.output.returnGate = returnFlight.gate

#price total
def extract_number(price_str):
    return ''.join(c for c in price_str if (c.isdigit() or c == '.'))

outbound_price = extract_number(outboundFlight.price)
return_price = extract_number(returnFlight.price)
self.output.totalPrice = str(float(outbound_price) + float(return_price))
spec.name: CodeBlock 3

totalPrice.description: The total price of the outbound and return flights
